mapper.insert: insert into member (memId, email, memName, memPwd, phone, birthday, gender) values (#{memId}, #{email}, #{memName}, #{memPwd}, #{phone},#{birthday},#{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET totalPay=#{totalPay} where memId=#{memId}
UPDATE member SET memPwd=#{memPwd} where email=#{email} and memId=#{memId}
mapper.select: select memId from member where email=#{email}
select memPwd from member where email=#{email} and memId=#{memId} and memName=#{memName} and phone=#{phone}
select * from member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
select count(*) from member where ${searchOption} like #{keyword}
